speaker.header: In this year's React conference, we will be honored to receive your articles in all related areas to JavaScript. The articles will be judged after submission, and if confirm, We will be happy to host you as our speaker.We are glad to receive your presentations, which shows your work experience and creativity.
speaker.body: Data Structures and Algorithms in JavaScript, Reactive Programming, ReactNative, Performance, State Managements, Testing Javascript Applications, Cross Platform Applications, Web Assembly, Styling in depth or anything in your passion.
